body:
### Problem

i was building the neovim source code ,, after taking the command "sudo make install ", it seems like its stucked , and ended with a "_build stopped_ subcommand failed. make_ ___ [Makefile_99_ deps] Error 1"

### Steps to reproduce

MY steps:
1.git clone https://github.com/neovim/neovim.git
2.cd ./neovim 
3.make CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo 



here is the console output
-- Installing: /home/friends/neovim/.deps/usr/include/luv/lreq.h
[130/136] Performing download step (download, verify and extract) for 'lpeg'
FAILED: build/src/lpeg-stamp/lpeg-download /home/friends/neovim/.deps/build/src/lpeg-stamp/lpeg-download
cd /home/friends/neovim/.deps/build/src && /usr/bin/cmake -P /home/friends/neovim/.deps/build/src/lpeg-stamp/download-lpeg.cmake && /usr/bin/cmake -P /home/friends/neovim/.deps/build/src/lpeg-stamp/verify-lpeg.cmake && /usr/bin/cmake -P /home/friends/neovim/.deps/build/src/lpeg-stamp/extract-lpeg.cmake && /usr/bin/cmake -E touch /home/friends/neovim/.deps/build/src/lpeg-stamp/lpeg-download
-- Downloading...
   dst='/home/friends/neovim/.deps/build/downloads/lpeg/lpeg-1.1.0.tar.gz'
   timeout='none'
   inactivity timeout='none'
-- Using src='https://github.com/neovim/deps/raw/d495ee6f79e7962a53ad79670cb92488abe0b9b4/opt/lpeg-1.1.0.tar.gz'
-- Retrying...
-- Using src='https://github.com/neovim/deps/raw/d495ee6f79e7962a53ad79670cb92488abe0b9b4/opt/lpeg-1.1.0.tar.gz'
-- Retry after 5 seconds (attempt #2) ...
-- Using src='https://github.com/neovim/deps/raw/d495ee6f79e7962a53ad79670cb92488abe0b9b4/opt/lpeg-1.1.0.tar.gz'
-- Retry after 5 seconds (attempt #3) ...
-- Using src='https://github.com/neovim/deps/raw/d495ee6f79e7962a53ad79670cb92488abe0b9b4/opt/lpeg-1.1.0.tar.gz'
-- Retry after 15 seconds (attempt #4) ...
-- Using src='https://github.com/neovim/deps/raw/d495ee6f79e7962a53ad79670cb92488abe0b9b4/opt/lpeg-1.1.0.tar.gz'
-- Retry after 60 seconds (attempt #5) ...
-- Using src='https://github.com/neovim/deps/raw/d495ee6f79e7962a53ad79670cb92488abe0b9b4/opt/lpeg-1.1.0.tar.gz'
CMake Error at lpeg-stamp/download-lpeg.cmake:170 (message):
  Each download failed!

    error: downloading 'https://github.com/neovim/deps/raw/d495ee6f79e7962a53ad79670cb92488abe0b9b4/opt/lpeg-1.1.0.tar.gz' failed
          status_code: 7
          status_string: "Couldn't connect to server"
          log:

  Connected to github.com (20.205.243.166) port 443 (#0)

### Expected behavior

want to know how to solve it,and what caused the problem 

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

0.9

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

WSL2

### Terminal name/version

zsh

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-256color

### Installation

source code

comment_data.body: Flaky network connection; not much we can do about that. Certainly not a bug in Neovim.

labels.description: issues that are closed as duplicates of other issues
labels.name: closed:duplicate

title: ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed. make: *** [Makefile:99: deps] Error 1
